attributes.action: Raise the motorway speed limit to 80mph in line with most of europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current speed limit on british motorways is completely out of date.  The limit was set when very few cars could even reach this speed let alone exceed it.  Most traffic policemen agree that an 80mph limit is perfectly acceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
